pages.title: about
pages.text: #关于 欢迎来到我的小站！ 这里**目前**还没什么东西......

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment I want to make Travis CI work so I changed this article.

posts.title: 一个测试用的文章
posts.text: 一个很大的标题一个挺短的段落。 但它还有个第二行。 一些粗体字 和 一些斜体字 。要不把它们 结合起来 ? The perfect recipe for a blog: npm install hexo-cli -ghexo initnpm installhexo new post 【Post Name】hexo server That’s easy!
